original_title: Power Rangers Ninja Storm: Prelude to a Storm
overview: Ninja Storm is adrenaline-rushing, edge-of-your-seat Power Rangers action! Shane, Tori, and Dustin, three misfit Ninja students, have been endowed with the powers of the legendary Super Megazords! Earth's greatest protectors must battle sinister space aliens and menacing monsters! In "Prelude To A Storm," the mighty Ninja Storm Rangers must defeat the evil Lothan, a former Ninja whose hunger for supremacy got him banished from Earth. As Lothan's army rains terror on an unsuspecting planet, will the Power Rangers have what it takes to save the world? Only if they remember that it takes teamwork, trust, and friendship to save the day!
title: Power Rangers Ninja Storm: Prelude to a Storm
